engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_who_use_drugs: We are still in the process of bringing our regional coordinator on board, and they will work with Great Meadows Communities to build programs that are responsive to each community, as well as the region.

behavioral_health_assessment._comment: G3: How behavioral health needs were assessed
behavioral_health_assessment.admin_data_sources: We are still in the process of bringing our regional coordinator on board, and they will work with Great Meadows Communities to build programs that are responsive to each community, as well as the region.
behavioral_health_assessment.other_methods: We provided funding the Lincoln Sudbury Regional High School to purchase additional AED units to support staff responding to opioid overdoses.
behavioral_health_assessment.barriers: We are still in the process of bringing our regional coordinator on board, and they will work with Great Meadows Communities to build programs that are responsive to each community, as well as the region.

planning.process: We engaged in shared planning with other municipalities. We contracted a consultant to support this process.
